pages.title: Refined Storage
pages.text: Refined Storage is a mass storage mod for Minecraft that offers the player a network-based storage system, allowing them to store items and fluids on a massively expandable device network.$(li)$(l:https://refinedmods.com/refined-storage)Wiki$(/l)$(li)$(l:https://discord.com/invite/VYzsydb)Discord$(/l)$(li)$(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cL9waY82pS4)Spotlight$(/l) (it's old, but still mostly good. Part 1 of 3)$()
